Combat
Hit Points: 164 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 19 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Plate Shield: None Weapons: Glaive (+6 1d10); Longbow (+8 1d8+2 R150/600); Morningstar (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+6 1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Aura Of Conquest: R30' Frightened foes suffer immobility and 10 HP psychic each rd
Aura Of The Guardian: R30' Can use a reaction to transfer damage from another to self
Conquering Presence: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to frighten targets for 1 min (save DC 16 Wisdom ends)
Divine Smite: Can spend a spell slot after a successful melee attack to inflict 1d8 HP radiant plus 1d8 HP per slot level, up to a maximum of 5d8 HP; undead and fiends suffer an additional 1d8 HP
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Emissary Of Redemption: Has resistance to all attack damage, and a successful attacker takes radiant damage equal to half that inflicted; attacking a creature negates these effects with it until a long rest
Guided Strike: Can use Channel Divinity to give self +10 attack
Improved Divine Smite: Melee attacks inflict +1d8 HP radiant
Invincible Conqueror: Can gain resistance to all damage, make an extra attack, and crit on a natural 19 for 1 min once per long rest
Protective Spirit: Regains 1d6+10 hit points at the end of a turn when below 82 hit points
Rebuke The Violent: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to inflict equal damage on a successful attacker of another (save DC 16 Wisdom half)
Scornful Rebuke: Successful attackers suffer 2 HP psychic
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 8; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Aura Of Courage: R30' Self and allies have immunity to fright
Aura Of Protection: R30' Self and allies +2 all saves
Divine Health: Has immunity to disease
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 4; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 2; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: P: 8; S: 8 Spell DC: P: 16; S: 16
Spells:
Aid (P2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Armor Of Agathys (P1 [Oath Of Conquest] Abju): Self gains 5 temporary hit points, and a successful attacker suffers 5 HP cold, for 1 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points and inflicts +5 HP]
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Banishment (P4 Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (P3 [Oath Of Conquest] Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Bless (P1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Calm Emotions (P2 [Oath Of Redemption] Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses a choice of charm and fright or hostility (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Cloudkill (P5 [Oath Of Conquest] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Color Spray (S1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Command (P1 [Oath Of Conquest] Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Counterspell (P3 [Oath Of Redemption] Abju): R60' Negates foe casting up to spell level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level negates a higher-level spell [+Level negates any spell of equal or lesser level]
Cure Wounds (P1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Detect Magic (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Evil And Good (P5 Abju): Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead suffer disadvantage on attacks vs. self for concentration up to 1 min; a successful spell attack returns them to their home plane (save Charisma negates), and touch also ends their enchantment, fright, or possession on the creature touched
Dominate Beast (P4 [Oath Of Conquest] Ench): R60' Target beast obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 5, 6, or 7]
Dominate Person (P5 [Oath Of Conquest] Ench): R60' Target humanoid obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 6, 7, or 8]
Fear (P3 [Oath Of Conquest] Illu): Creatures in a 30' cone flee (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Hold Monster (P5 [Oath Of Redemption] Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Person (P2 [Oath Of Conquest] Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Person (P2 [Oath Of Redemption] Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hypnotic Pattern (P3 [Oath Of Redemption] Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become incapacitated (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min; taking damage ends the effects
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Magic Weapon (P2 Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives a +2 or +3 bonus at level 4 or 6]
Mending (S0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Otiluke's Resilient Sphere (P4 [Oath Of Redemption] Evoc): R30' Traps the target in an impervious sphere (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Sanctuary (P1 [Oath Of Redemption] Abju): R30' Foes of the target cannot attack it (save Wisdom negates) for 1 min; target attacking ends
Sleep (P1 [Oath Of Redemption] Ench): R90' 20' radius puts to sleep 5d8 hit points of creatures, starting with those with the least hit points, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 hit points of creatures]
Spiritual Weapon (P2 [Oath Of Conquest] Evoc): R60' Creates a spectral weapon that inflicts 1d8+2 HP and can move 20' and attack as a bonus action for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP per 2 levels]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Stoneskin (P4 [Oath Of Conquest] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Stoneskin (P4 [Oath Of Redemption] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Wall Of Force (P5 [Oath Of Redemption] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for concentration up to 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect once per short rest
Cleansing Touch: Can dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2 times per long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Lay On Hands: Can heal 100 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure a disease or neutralize a poison
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
